meanings.sent1: The artist created a sculpturesque statue of a lion.
meanings.sent2: The garden was filled with sculpturesque figures that seemed to come to life.
meanings.sent3: The cake was so beautifully decorated, it looked almost sculpturesque.
meanings.sent4: Her movements on the dance floor were like a sculpturesque performance.
meanings.sent5: The sunset painted the sky in a sculpturesque array of colors.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a sculpture.
meanings.sent1: The ancient ruins had a sculpturesque appearance in the moonlight.
meanings.sent2: The old building had a sculpturesque facade that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The clouds in the sky formed a sculpturesque shape that made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The music flowed through the room in a sculpturesque manner, captivating the audience.
meanings.sent5: The landscape looked like a sculpturesque painting come to life.

meanings.definition: Having the characteristics of a sculpture.
meanings.sent1: The dress had a sculpturesque silhouette that accentuated her figure.
meanings.sent2: The tree had a sculpturesque quality that made it stand out in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The cat stretched out in a sculpturesque pose on the windowsill.
meanings.sent4: The city skyline at night had a sculpturesque beauty that took his breath away.
meanings.sent5: The waves crashing against the rocks created a sculpturesque scene by the shore.
